blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Learned about the importance of visualizations in the field of observability
- Planned for your visualizations so that dashboards align with business objectives
- Used the Grafana Query Builder to write a LogQL query
- Built a dashboard that contains a logs aggregation visualization

**Related paths**

Consider taking the following paths after you complete this journey:

- [Create infrastructure alerts](/docs/learning-paths/infrastructure-alerting/)

**More to explore (optional)**

The world is your oyster! Read more about how you can:

- [Configure value mappings](/docs/grafana/latest/panels-visualizations/configure-value-mappings/)
- [Configure field overrides](/docs/grafana/latest/panels-visualizations/configure-overrides/)
- [Configure thresholds](/docs/grafana/latest/panels-visualizations/configure-thresholds/)
- [Configure standard options](/docs/grafana/latest/panels-visualizations/configure-standard-options/)
